Class Jeu

java.lang.Object
  prototype.Jeu
Direct Known Subclasses:
JeuRDF, JeuSesame, JeuSPARQL
public abstract class Jeu
extends Object

Abstract class managing a data set from any origin.

Version:
01042012
Author:
Thibaud Colas
See Also:

public org.openrdf.query.TupleQueryResult SPARQLQuery(String query)
                                               throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                                      org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                                      org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
Sends and evaluates a SPARQL select query on the data set.

Parameters:
query - : The SPARQL query without its prefixes.
Returns:
The result of the query.
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Query isn't valid.
org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Error while accessing the repository.
org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - Query result isn't valid.

public void updateQuery(String query)
                 throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,

Parameters:
query - : The SPARQL query without its prefixes.
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Query isn't valid.
org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Error while accessing the repository.
